name: The rising of don Quijote
description:
In the game, the main character is Don Quixote de la Mancha, who interprets reality differently from other people and imagines things like the stones, ducks and mills turning into monsters that must be defeated.

Controls:
  • Use "A" and "D" to move sideways.
  • The Space key to jump.
  • Use the left click of the mousse to attack.
  • And with the "E" you can use the bicycle that will become a horse.
Developed by:

Art of logic to compete in the Platzi Olympics in the contest "The game of Truh".

Credits:

Animation: Brandon Osco

Concept art: Brandon Osco

Game Design: Brandon Osco & Manuel Peñaloza

Scripting: Manuel Peñaloza

Sound Effects: Manuel Peñaloza
